title: Weather Project
description: This Website is related to do the work of Printing Press
details: Designed and developed a dynamic weather project website, providing real-time weather information for cities worldwide. Leveraged HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap to create a user-friendly interface that allows users to easily access weather data for their desired locations.

title: Cloth Donation Camp
